title: Web master wanted
content:
Hi

I'm looking for a web master to customize and install a web template for me.

You can check out the template

flashmint.com/show-template-5899.html

I don't need anything fanciful. Just changing over the texts and the imagery to my own AND  
adding a booking facility. The requirements for the latter can be further discussed.

Thank you.
author: Allison Miller
